```{r}

years <- 2000:2023
inflation <- cumsum(runif(length(years), -0.5, 0.5)) + 2

plot(years, inflation, type = "o", 
     main = "Inflation Rates Over Time", 
     xlab = "Year", 
     ylab = "Inflation Rate (%)", 
     col = "green", 
     pch = 16, 
     lwd = 2,          
     cex = 1.5,        
     col.axis = "blue", 
     col.lab = "purple", 
     xaxt = "n")       

axis(1, at = seq(2000, 2023, by = 2), las = 2)  
```
